description:
Role Title: Proposal Engineer
Department: Engineering
Seniority Level: Junior
Required Skills: Communication

Role Overview:
We are seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Proposal Engineer to join our Engineering department. The Proposal Engineer will play a pivotal role in the bidding process by developing and submitting unique, tailored proposals. This role requires a mix of technical expertise and strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with our team and present our capabilities to clients.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Work closely with the sales and engineering teams to understand project requirements and client needs.
2. Prepare and submit comprehensive and competitive technical proposals.
3. Collaborate with various internal departments to gather necessary information for proposal development.
4. Perform risk identification and management during the bidding process.
5. Provide technical support to sales team during customer negotiations.
6. Maintain up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, technical developments, and potential new product/service offerings.
7. Ensure all proposals comply with company standards and client requirements.

Required Qualifications:
1. Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or a related field.
2. Minimum of 1 year experience in proposal development or a related role.
3. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal.
4. Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with various internal teams.
5. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel and PowerPoint.
6. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
7. Strong attention to detail and a high level of accuracy in work output.

Preferred Qualifications:
1. Prior experience in an engineering or technical sales environment.
2. Knowledge of CRM software.
3. Familiarity with the manufacturing industry and its processes.

What We Offer:
1. Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses.
2. Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
3. Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off.
4. A supportive, inclusive, and collaborative work environment.
5. Opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects in an innovative industry.

Join our team and be part of a company that values innovation, collaboration, and personal growth. Apply today to start your journey with us.

required_skills: python . ai . ml , dl , programing knowledge, communication
description:
Role Title: Junior AI Engineer
Department: Engineering

Role Overview:
We are seeking a dedicated and innovative Junior AI Engineer to join our Engineering Department. You will play a key role in designing, developing, and implementing AI models and solutions to improve our products and services. This role requires in-depth knowledge of AI technologies including Machine Learning (ML), Deep Learning (DL), and strong programming skills in Python.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with the engineering team to design and implement AI models.
- Analyze machine learning algorithms that could be used to improve our products.
- Understand business objectives and develop models that help to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress.
- Conduct research and implement best practices to improve the current machine learning infrastructure.
- Collaborate with product management and engineering department to understand company needs and devise possible solutions.
- Ensure the quality and performance of the AI models that are produced.
- Keep abreast of developments in the field of AI and ML.

Required Qualifications:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- Strong Python programming skills.
- Deep understanding of AI, ML, and DL.
- Familiarity with machine learning frameworks (like Keras or PyTorch) and libraries (like scikit-learn).
- Excellent communication skills to effectively collaborate with the team and present complex concepts in a clear, concise manner.
- Strong problem-solving skills and analytical abilities.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Master's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
- Experience working with GPUs to develop models.
- Experience with cloud services (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure).
- Experience in implementing AI/ML in real-world industrial settings.

What We Offer:
We provide an environment where you can grow and develop your career, with opportunities for continual learning. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, flexible work hours, and the opportunity to work with a team of professionals who are passionate about the cutting-edge technology they work with. We foster an inclusive and diverse work environment where your unique perspectives and ideas are valued. 

Join us and be a part of our innovative team, applying cutting-edge AI technologies to real-world problems.
